title: Fleek (YC W22) Is Hiring for Operations Lead
description:
# About Fleek

Fleek (YC W22) is a B2B Marketplace for wholesale second hand fashion. We enable Gen-Z resellers and retail stores to buy from vintage clothing suppliers from around the world. 

We are reimagining the supply chain of used clothing and empowering a whole new generation of sellers. At Fleek, we keep it circular, trendy, and sustainable. 

We are backed by Y Combinator and other Top VC funds (Confidential at the moment)

# Role specific details

Your responsibility will be to help sustain the growth flywheel for Fleek. You need to be scrappy, innovative and an analytical thinker. Our buyers and sellers are hard working GenZ-ers. Being able to have a voice that resonates with our user base is important for success in this role! You should also be willing to wear multiple hats as we grow.

In this role you will be responsible for Order & supplier operations. Buyers can buy in various ways on the website (direct bundles, video calls or custom orders) and each of these mechanism requires fulfillment processes to be put in place. You should be ready to get your hands dirty. The key to success is to understand the existing manual processes and help streamline/automate them.

You will also be responsible to keep the levels of inventory healthy on the platform. That includes engaging with our supplier community and setting up account management for each one of them.

# Preferred Skills

- 3+ years of experience running operations at a early stage startup
- Ability to hire and grow your team
- Experience working directly with customers

# Benefits

We at Fleek believe in happy employees. We want it to feel like home :-)

- Comprehensive healthcare coverage
- Exclusive employee clothing drops courtesy Fleek
- Flexible work hours & time off. We don’t care where you are as long as the work gets done
- Shared ownership: Being On Fleek means you’ll own a part of it
